change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "engineering professional" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 11/2021, effective February 5, 2021.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: engineering professional means a person who is

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a professional engineer as defined in the Engineers and Geoscientists Act, or
a holder of a limited licence under the Engineers and Geoscientists Act that permits the person to practise professional engineering and who is acting within the scope of the limited licence;

change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "engineering professional" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: engineering professional means a person who is registered under the Professional Governance Act as a professional engineer or professional engineering licensee;
